name: asynciterator
description: An asynchronous iterator library for advanced object pipelines.
author: Ruben Verborgh <ruben@verborgh.org>

scripts.perf: npm run perf:transform && npm run perf:buffered
scripts.perf:browser: npm run perf:browser:transform && npm run perf:browser:buffered
scripts.perf:browser:buffered: webpack perf/BufferedIterator-perf.js -o perf/browser-source.js --mode development --display errors-only && node perf/browser-runner.js "./browser-source.js" && rm perf/browser-source.js
scripts.perf:browser:transform: webpack perf/TransformIterator-perf.js -o perf/browser-source.js --mode development --display errors-only && node perf/browser-runner.js "./browser-source.js" && rm perf/browser-source.js
scripts.perf:browser:multitransform: webpack perf/MultiTransformIterator-perf.js -o perf/browser-source.js --mode development --display errors-only && node perf/browser-runner.js "./browser-source.js" && rm perf/browser-source.js
